valid: For the period 18:00 (UTC) on Wed 7 Jan 2026 to 18:00 (UTC) on Thu 8 Jan 2026
general_synopsis: Low moving rather quickly east expected Sole 986 by midday tomorrow. Low west of Bailey 998 expected Bailey 986 by same time. Low Dogger 993 losing its identity
